short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the width of ChatGPT responses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to customize the width of ChatGPT's responses. This eliminates the need to scroll across code blocks, and gives you control over how much, or how little, of your screen to use.
